text: Frederick Maroin Curtis (October 30, 1880 - April 5, 1939) was a Major League Baseball first baseman. Curtis played for the New York Highlanders in the season. In two career games, he had two hits, in 9 at-bats, a .222 batting average. He batted and threw right-handed. Curtis was born in Beaver Lake, Michigan and died in Minneapolis, Minnesota. ==External links== Category:1880 births Category:1939 deaths Category:New York Yankees players Category:Major League Baseball first basemen Category:Baseball players from Michigan Category:Minor league baseball managers Category:Cedar Rapids Rabbits players Category:Ottumwa Champs players Category:Oshkosh Indians players Category:Winona Pirates players Category:Superior Red Sox players Category:Winnipeg Maroons players
title: Fred Curtis
